<TextLayoutLeft>

Rapidly build beautiful and accessible experiences. The If Design System kit for Figma contains all resources you need to get started.

</TextLayoutLeft>

## Get the kit

<ul class="ids-doc if navigational cards three text">
  <li class="if">
    <a
      class="ids-doc if navigational-card text box"
      rel="noreferrer noopener"
      target="_blank"
      href="https://www.figma.com/files/project/27220218/UI-Design-Kit"
    >
      <span class="if title">UI Design Kit</span>
    </a>
  </li>
</ul>

### 1. Install Figma and set up an account

<TextLayoutLeft>

To design with IDS you must have an account at <a class="ids-doc" href="https://www.figma.com" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Figma</a> registered with your If email.

</TextLayoutLeft>

### 2. Get access

<TextLayoutLeft>

To get access to the Figma library, you have to send your email to Baļss, Oļegs on Teams or on [email](mailto:olegs.balss@if.lv) and you will get an invite to the If Design System library file on Adobe Assets.

</TextLayoutLeft>
<br />
